EmailTemplate.name: Newsletter March 2013
EmailTemplate.subject: Newsletter March 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
The latest newsletter is now online:
http://www.internationalschool.ru/en/school-life/newsletters.aspx
Instrumental Tuition Summer Term (Y1 - Y10 parents)
Please (click here) to find the request form and information regarding Individual music lessons for the summer term.
Please understand that the logistics of rearranging a timetable for late applications means that we can no longer accept students on to the timetable once it is in place.
With this in mind, please ensure that the form with payment is returned to school (Reception or Finance Office) by THURSDAY 11TH APRIL to avoid disappointment.
If you require any further information about the instrumental program, please do not hesitate to contact James Langford.
Best regards,
The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
